problem_names:
lemma elimder_guard:
  assumes "p = {l}\<langle>fg\<rangle> qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}\<langle>fg\<rangle> p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

lemma elimder_assign:
  assumes "p = {l}\<lbrakk>fa\<rbrakk> qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}\<lbrakk>fa\<rbrakk> p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

lemma elimder_ucast:
  assumes "p = {l}unicast(fip, fmsg).q1 \<triangleright> q2"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' pp' where "p = {l}unicast(fip, fmsg).p' \<triangleright> pp'"
                   and "case a of unicast _ _ \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q1
                                        | _ \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q2"

lemma elimder_bcast:
  assumes "p = {l}broadcast(fmsg).qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}broadcast(fmsg). p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

lemma elimder_gcast:
  assumes "p = {l}groupcast(fips, fmsg).qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}groupcast(fips, fmsg). p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

lemma elimder_send:
  assumes "p = {l}send(fmsg).qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}send(fmsg). p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

lemma elimder_deliver:
  assumes "p = {l}deliver(fdata).qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}deliver(fdata).p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

lemma elimder_receive:
  assumes "p = {l}receive(fmsg).qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}receive(fmsg).p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

lemmas elimders = 
   elimder_guard
   elimder_assign
   elimder_ucast
   elimder_bcast
   elimder_gcast
   elimder_send
   elimder_deliver
   elimder_receive
translations:
lemma elimder_guard:
  assumes "p = {l}\<langle>fg\<rangle> qq"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}\<langle>fg\<rangle> p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p'.
        \<lbrakk>p = {l}\<langle>fg\<rangle>
                 p';
         l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  p = {l}\<langle>fg\<rangle>
  qq
  l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q
  ((\<xi>, p), a, \<xi>', q) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p'.
        \<lbrakk>p = {l}\<langle>fg\<rangle>
                 p';
         l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' where "p = {l}\<lbrakk>fa\<rbrakk> p'"
               and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p'.
        \<lbrakk>p = {l}\<lbrakk>fa\<rbrakk>
                 p';
         l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  p = {l}\<lbrakk>fa\<rbrakk>
  qq
  l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q
  ((\<xi>, p), a, \<xi>', q) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p'.
        \<lbrakk>p = {l}\<lbrakk>fa\<rbrakk>
                 p';
         l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> qq\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

lemma elimder_ucast:
  assumes "p = {l}unicast(fip, fmsg).q1 \<triangleright> q2"
      and "l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q"
      and "((\<xi>, p), a, (\<xi>', q)) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>"
  obtains p' pp' where "p = {l}unicast(fip, fmsg).p' \<triangleright> pp'"
                   and "case a of unicast _ _ \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q1
                                        | _ \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p' pp'.
        \<lbrakk>p = {l}unicast(fip, fmsg) .
                        p' \<triangleright> pp';
         case a of unicast x xa \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q1
         | _ \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q2\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  p = {l}unicast(fip, fmsg) .
         q1 \<triangleright> q2
  l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q
  ((\<xi>, p), a, \<xi>', q) \<in> seqp_sos \<Gamma>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p' pp'.
        \<lbrakk>p = {l}unicast(fip, fmsg) .
                        p' \<triangleright> pp';
         case a of unicast x xa \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q1
         | _ \<Rightarrow> l' \<in> labels \<Gamma> q2\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by simp (erule seqpTEs, auto)

  qq

declare

  elimders [cterms_elimders]
end
